Text.Page:
It really is quite the most beautiful thing I've ever seen. And the scent... Mesmerizing...

Wha? Oh, the strelitzia flower. Don't you agree? I get so distracted that I'm almost afraid to go out there and pick them.

Will you get some for me?
Oh, thank you. I'm going to take cuttings and grow them myself. Acres of strelitzias as far as the eye can see...
Will you bring me more just to be safe?
